name: Add new survey responses to Vtiger as objects
description: Streamline your data collection process by automatically transferring new survey responses from Survey Anyplace to your Vtiger CRM. This template ensures that every time a participant submits a response, their information is seamlessly added as a new object in Vtiger, allowing you to manage and analyze your survey data effectively. Enhance your customer relationship management and make informed decisions based on real-time feedback.
